name: Zeb Mehring

experience.title: Constellations
experience.detail: Played Roland in Constellations at the Calhoun Cabaret in April 2016.

experience.title: The Winter's Tale
experience.detail: Played Florizel in The Winter's Tale at the Iseman Theater in November 2015.

bio: Traveler, actor, and aspiring programmer from Maui, Hawaii. </br> I travel the world with my family, act in fascinating and engaging roles, and in my free time, I love to lift weights, read, and converse with interesting people. </br> My passions lie in communicating and sharing ideas with others, working with technology, and making everyone's lives a little bit better.
